website_summaries.verdict: For a bride looking for a  sophisticated heel, there’s no going wrong with this fancy and glamorous designer pair.
pros: 4” heel and ankle strap both prove to be comfortable for all-day wear
Purchase is conveniently accompanied by extra rhinestones
Elegant design works for all seasons and with a variety of dress styles
cons: those between sizes should order one half-size up

customer_reviews.title: My beautiful wedding shoes
customer_reviews.text: My beautiful wedding shoes! These were stunners from the beginning, and I'm so glad I wore them for my wedding. The only downside was, they never seemed to break in. I wore them for at least 4 weeks prior to the wedding, even attending dancing lessons in them multiple times, in an attempt to break them in and it just never happened. I was still so happy with the shoes and the look! The front toe is simple and elegant, and the back is so sparkly and really caught so many eyes. But I would not recommend wearing for more than a few hours at a time. (Tip: buy a beautiful pair of Badgley Mischka flats to change into!)
customer_reviews.author: JJ Mintz

customer_reviews.title: Fit true to size :)
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are absolutely beautiful and are so comfortable! I wear a size 8, ordered a size 8 and they fit perfectly. They make your feet glitter and sparkle, saving your ankles from a life time of boredom! Great for dressing up an outfit or standing out on your wedding! Love these shoes!!
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten Chester

customer_reviews.title: Ivory is very dark!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful BUT the Ivory is more like Champagne and didn't match the Ivory lace on my wedding dress :(
customer_reviews.author: Brittny Ravotti

customer_reviews.title: Cinderella shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very happy I followed as instructed by other posters and sized up a 1/2 size. I'm usually a 6 1/2 in heels But reading reviews I went up to a 7 and they are perfect! So beautiful, The photo does not even do them justice. The height is comfortable and easy to walk in Will worry about comfort level my wedding day Till then I do not want the stones to accidently rub against each other or fall off.
customer_reviews.author: jbar

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, elegant, comfy shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so beautiful. My true size is 6.5 but I had to order a 7 as they run a little small. I've been looking for and ordering different Bagdley Mischka shoes for a month, but finally I have found the 'One I Love'. These shoes are beautifully made. Very comfy, and it won't hurt your toes. I'd recommend a silicon insoles for the toes if you want extra comfort.( If your are planning on dancing, or standing long periods of time).
customer_reviews.author: MEag

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these shoes! It was between this shoe and another shoe for my wedding shoes.....they other ones matched slightly better for my dress. These were very hard for me to return because I fell in love!!
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shoes, correct size, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so beautiful, I bought them for my daughter's wedding. They are true to size and very comfortable. The heel is not too high that it's hard to walk in, they are just right. If you are worried that they will be too small and you decide to buy half a size up they will not feel or appear big. They also came very fast, like 3 days after being ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Tatyana Havrylyuk

customer_reviews.title: GET EM!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely in love with these shoes! I took everyone's advice and ordered a size up. (Usually a size 8.5 but got a 9.) I think I could've ordered my regular size. But other than that, AMAZING shoes! I think they will be the perfect accompaniment to my wedding dress! They sent extra rhinestones and extra heels.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Mohamed

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but only for show not walking in
customer_reviews.text: I know dress shoes aren't suppose to be super comfortable but the heel on this is so high and stiff had I not worn around my house for a bit I would have been sorry I kept them. I returned as I knew I couldn't wear if I planned on walking in them at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kari K

customer_reviews.title: Stunning shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely gorgeous. They are alot lighter than the picture shows. Which to me is perfect. The rhinestones shine beautifully. And i received them quickly.
customer_reviews.author: tmax14

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I fell in love with these online and they are way more amazing in person. I cant wait to wear them out! There are some places that rub, such as the heel and feels a bit tight on the toes so shoe inserts will need to be added for comfort. Will be worth it though!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.C

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL
customer_reviews.text: I love these heels so much. They fit perfectly. For reference, I am a size 8.5 in heels and it is exactly what I ordered. The heel is the perfect height and they are absolutely stunning in person. I cannot wait to wear these for my wedding!!
customer_reviews.author: VT

customer_reviews.title: Not very comfortable though. It was between these and another option ...
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous shoe! Not very comfortable though. It was between these and another option for my wedding. These matched perfectly but with the cost difference AND them being uncomfortable, I couldn't argue. I has to chose the other shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Anastazia

customer_reviews.title: and found the 9 to be the perfect fit. I did get some gel inserts for ...
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews, I did order a size 9. I usually fit a size 8.5 and occasionally a 9, and found the 9 to be the perfect fit. I did get some gel inserts for the bottom of my feet as I plan to dance all night in these at my wedding. So happy with these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Marie Willyard

customer_reviews.title: Simply beautiful shoe, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Simply beautiful shoe, comfortable, and matches my designer gown perfectly. I read to order a 1/2 size larger, and I did. They fit perfectly. Can't wait to wear them to my sons wedding.
customer_reviews.author: christina wagner

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are beautiful and fit perfectly
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are beautiful and fit perfectly. I found them to be very comfortable. Pictures can’t even begin to capture how sparkly they look in person and I can’t wait to wear them for my wedding!
customer_reviews.author: Nina B.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Mischkas!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are stunning!! They actually fit perfectly but I would have been okay to order 1/2 size larger. I wear a size 8 and this is true to size fit. The heel is perfect and it's very comfortable. The design is timeless so I expect I'll wear them again.
customer_reviews.author: mickeyog

customer_reviews.title: Not Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed with these shoes. I was expecting them to be comfortable, and they were far from that. They have bad support and won't work for my wedding day when you can hardly wear them for an hour. Will be returning and continuing my search...
customer_reviews.author: Mgb

customer_reviews.title: They are beautiful, but there were to big and the heel ...
customer_reviews.text: They are beautiful, but there were to big and the heel height far exceeded my ability to maneuver in this shoe. I wish it were a stack or platform to of set the 4" heel height. Sadly, I sent them back yesterday. The quest for the perfect wedding shoe continues...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shoes. You should have put tissue paper or ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoes. You should have put tissue paper or some sort of paper in the box to protect the shoes, they looked a little beat-up.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah S

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so comfortable and we’re perfect for my wedding day
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wedding shoes... stunning yet painful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! More beautiful in person! Love love loved them! Hurt my feet after about 45 min. But they sure were pretty!
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Got these in black and they are gorgeous!! ...
customer_reviews.text: Got these in black and they are gorgeous!!! I usually wear 8.5 but should have ordered a 9. Can't wait to show these off😍
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: amazingly beautiful..
customer_reviews.text: amazingly beautiful... I could not keep these as the stones got caught to the front of my wedding dress at my first trial. back in the box they went. so sad because they were comfortable!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Solliday

customer_reviews.title: i love these fantastic shoes.....
customer_reviews.text: They are just beautiful. The color is magnificient. They fit exactly right. quality is beyond compare.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too much glam!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these a half size larger than I normally wear and they were a comfortable size. I don't think I realized from the photo how sparkly/glam they are. I can't comment on how comfortable they are worn long-term since I ultimately decided against them, but they seem well made. The rhinestone-lined fabric is somewhat stiff and I imagine it would cut into my foot if worn all night. All in all, a good-quality shoe but I would only get it if you want all the glam!
customer_reviews.author: Sherbet

customer_reviews.title: I wear an 8 1/2 and they fit perfectly. These shoes are absolutely BEAUTIFUL and will be perfect for my upcoming wedding.
customer_reviews.text: The mail package came OPEN not sealed. $200.00 is A lot to lose. Glad they didn’t fall out while in transition to get to my home. Or get stolen they are gorgeous shoes.
customer_reviews.author: jenjohnson

customer_reviews.title: This shoe is spectacular. Came wrapped with extra heels ...
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is spectacular. Came wrapped with extra heels and studs.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Merezio

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoes and fairly comfortable. Wish they had more colors.
customer_reviews.author: LeslieMc

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are beautiful! The half size up is slightly big on me but I rather that then having them feel too tight. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Stunning unbeatable quality
customer_reviews.text: My future husband said...these are the 1's ! My mother agreed.
customer_reviews.author: buter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfect they are really sexy I’m very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: They match my dress perfectly and their comfort level is not bad. I should be able to go a good ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are exactly what I expected them to be. They match my dress perfectly and their comfort level is not bad. I should be able to go a good majority of the wedding day/night without having to remove them. So EXCITED!!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Not very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Runs a bit small. Usually wear a 9.5 but these fit more like a 9. Order half size up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are VERY uncomfortable! I wore them for ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are VERY uncomfortable! I wore them for my wedding and I ended up limping the rest of the day. I had to take them off unfortunately and ended up barefoot. ughr...
customer_reviews.author: Amal Madih

customer_reviews.title: I love them can't wait to wear
customer_reviews.text: They are stunning! The fit is narrow. I have a narrow foot anyway but if you have a fatter foot, they will not fit you! I love them can't wait to wear
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing shoe!
customer_reviews.text: My mom wore it for my wedding! She loved it and the look is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: shel_maui

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with my choice. I am looking forward to wearing my shoes for my wedding in September!!
customer_reviews.author: sheree anthony

customer_reviews.title: Badgley Mischka Roxy Sandal in Ivory (Women's 7.5)
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are stunningly gorgeous! I thought they looked pretty in the pictures, but they're even nicer in person. I caved and dropped the cash since it's for my wedding, and I am so glad that I did. I wouldn't change feature on them, they are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful shoes! It looked absolutely lovely with my wedding dress.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shoes. Will look perfect on my wedding day
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoes. Will look perfect on my wedding day. I did order half a size larger than normal as they do come up small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely gorgeous! Comfortable! But.... I ordered these for $51 from this exact link... how is it now $130?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love love love them more stunning than I could have ...
customer_reviews.text: Love love love them more stunning than I could have imagined and super fast delivery ordered sat Eve and arrived to me in uk on Thursday thanks so much
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty, I got 1/2 size up just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hi! The shoes are spectacular but I must change them for a detail in the stone
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Thrift

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but painful!
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying that I love this shoe! Now the cons: 1/2 size too small and painful in the toe box. But I put on some really thick socks(talking so thick that my toes were numb) and pointed my blow dryer at the painful parts of the shoe! 10 minutes later... Voila! They do not hurt any longer! I actually am breaking them in right now. I am going to put so gel pads in them too. It's going to be a long night and I don't want to be miserable on the happiest day of my life!
customer_reviews.author: Christina S

customer_reviews.title: I am totally obsessed they are so beautiful I love them SO much
customer_reviews.text: I am wearing these shoes for my wedding day! I am totally obsessed they are so beautiful I love them SO much!!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Todisco

customer_reviews.title: Love love love.
customer_reviews.text: I actually ordered them a half size larger because I originally ordered a different show in my size and they were too small. I'm so glad I did because they fit perfectly. These were the shoes I originally wanted because of the strap and embellishments. I'm so happy. They are beautiful and perfect for my wedding day. My something blue.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia LaRocca

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are stunning!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are stunning! Will be perfect for my upcoming wedding!
customer_reviews.author: Lois M. Stepney

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It looks really beautiful! Unfortunately, front toes area is too small for me.
customer_reviews.author: kathy

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous shoes
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted these shoes for my wedding. When they arrived I fell in love they are beautiful. The colour looked more like champagne which I wanted. They are narrow I definitely had to go up half a size. I'm not sure how comfortable they will be to wear all day but I will feet comforters if I have too. Arrived quick thank you amazon
customer_reviews.author: Ms. K. Steer

customer_reviews.title: Not a happy customer.
customer_reviews.text: Cute pumps, but not true to size. Not only that, but Amazon customer service was terrible. I can't even get a half size up for remotely the same price! Never had this much difficulty with Amazon before. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Baron

product_meta.title: Badgley Mischka Women's Roxy Dress Sandal
product_meta.description:
Hundreds of sparkling hand-placed stones adorn this beautiful pump

In the frenetic, often tumultuous fashion industry, Mark Badgley and James Mischka are a rare breed. Hailed by Vogue as among the "Top 10 American Designers" and the darlings of the young Hollywood set, this design team has made their mark with the most glamorous, stylish and wearable evening wear to come along in years. Since Mark and James joined forces in 1988, Badgley Mischka has captivated the fashion press and prominent retailers with their sophisticated style that caters to a younger, more modern couture customer, while not forsaking women of any age. They have remained true to this design philosophy and the consistent integrity of their collections have pushed them to the forefront of fashion. The Badgley Mischka signature style is simple, streamlined and thoroughly elegant.
feature_bullets: Two-piece sandal with slender ankle strap, scalloped topline, and pinking detail traced with jewels
Fit Tip: If between sizes, order 0.5 size up.
